author: craigmcc
msg: Add a "fast" version of TreeMap, analogous to the other collection class

author: craigmcc
msg: Avoid a race condition when two threads try to perform a "modify"
operation on the collection at the same time in fast mode.  This would not
generally happen in the way that Struts uses these classes, but is an
appropriate precaution for a general purpose collection class.

author: craigmcc
msg: Take advantage of the fact that java.util.Collections offers an immutable
empty list we can use to create empty iterators.

author: craigmcc
msg: Clarify the documentation for the <form-bean> element to reflect the fact
that ActionForm is now a class.

author: craigmcc
msg: When processing a Map containing parameters to be added to the URL,
treat a null value (which is legal in Java2 collections) to mean "no
value specified".  This will cause "name=" to be added to the URL.
